sentences.english: Did anybody notice this year's Emmy's was the gayest award show ever?
sentences.chinese: 就没人觉得这届艾美奖是史上最基情四射的一届吗？
激情洋溢，充满活力，热力四射。

sentences.english: Because you're a young, attractive white woman.
sentences.chinese: 因为你是一个魅力四射的白种妙龄女郎。

sentences.english: I was young, passionate, and believed in all the "impossibles".
sentences.chinese: 那时的我年幼，激情四射，并且相信一切“不可能”。

sentences.english: Originally, the radiant sun is the embodiment of three -legged crow.
sentences.chinese: 原来，光芒四射的太阳只是三足乌鸦的化身。

sentences.english: Bull-puncher knickers and condole take collocation to give heating power 4 ejaculation sex appeal.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔短裤与吊带搭配出热力四射的性感。

sentences.english: These sassy shoes will enliven little black dresses.
sentences.chinese: 这些活力四射的鞋子会给小黑裙带来点睛之效。

sentences.english: The lights sparkled from crystal chandeliers.
sentences.chinese: 水晶装饰灯的灯光四射。

sentences.english: With Mindfulness clear and radiant, I purify my mind.
sentences.chinese: 我用清晰的光芒四射的智慧净化我的思想。

sentences.english: Travel lighter on your journey with an open heart and feel alive.
sentences.chinese: 带着一棵开放的心轻装上阵，活力四射。

sentences.english: His mind is sharp, his memory elephantine, and he bristles with energy and vigour.
sentences.chinese: 梅莱斯头脑敏锐，记忆超群，精力充沛，活力四射。

sentences.english: Two roses from pruning are still radiant.
sentences.chinese: 修剪下来两朵玫瑰依旧艳光四射。

sentences.english: The sun, which had hidden all day, now came out in full splendor.
sentences.chinese: 那太阳，整天躲在云层里，现在又光芒四射了。

sentences.english: It would fly wildly with the stumps of its burned wings towards that radiant portal.
sentences.chinese: 这灵魂用它烧残的翅膀发狂地向光芒四射的大门飞去。

sentences.english: Climing up the tree and over the house, the sun's rays become radiant.
sentences.chinese: 大阳的树和房子，阳光变得光芒四射。

definition: (of a perfume or a foul odor) permeating the whole place/(of grease etc) dripping everywhere/flowing all over the place
to radiate/to shine/glitter of light/a glint
(of droplets, sparks etc) to fly about in all directions/to splatter everywhere
to dazzle/to brighten up (a room etc)
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
